description: One-minute skill: Commodity Dependence in Emerging Economies.

hook.text: When oil dropped from $100 to $30, Nigeria's stock market and currency collapsed together.

climax.text: Check a country's export mix before investing. Diversified economies weather commodity cycles far better.

punchline.text: A commodity-dependent country is a double bet: the nation and the resource.

quiz.question: Why is commodity dependence risky for emerging economies?
